title: Spicy Rice Noodle Soup with Sesame Korean-Style Tofu (V)
keywords: Spicy, Rice noodles, Tofu, Korean-style, Sesame, Soup, Vegetarian

method.step: Boil a full kettle
Add your rice noodles to a bowl and cover with boiled water
Set aside for 12-15 minutes or until softened
Once softened, drain the softened noodles and set aside
Re boil a full kettle
Drain your tofu and pat it dry with kitchen paper, then tear into small bite size pieces
Add the torn tofu and half your tamari soy sauce to a large bowl and mix it all together
Once fully combined, add your cornflour to the bowl and give everything a good mix up until the tofu is fully coated
Peel and finely grate your garlic
Trim, then slice your spring onion(s) finely
Add half your gochujang paste and rice vinegar to a small bowl with your sugar and your cold water
Give everything a good mix up.  This is your spicy Korean style sauce
Heat a large, wide based pan with a very general drizzle of vegetable oil (Enough to cover the whole base of the pan) over a medium heigh heat
Once hot, add the chopped garlic and remaining gochujang paste to the pot and cook for 1-2 minutes or until fragrant
Once fragrant, add the remaining tamari soy sauce, pho broth paste, vegetable stock mix and your boiled water and give everything a good mix up.  This is your spicy broth
Bring the spicy broth to the boil, then then reduce the heat to medium heigh
Add your carrot & cabbage slaw mix to the pot and cook for 1-2 minutes or until the vegetables are softened
Once the vegetables have softened, add the softened noodles to the pot and give everything a good mix up.  This is your spicy rice noodle soup
Meanwhile, carefully pour away the oil from the reserved pan
Return the reserved pan to medium hear ad the crispy tofu, spicy Korean style sauce and your toasted sesame seeds and give everything a good mix up
Cook for 1-2 minutes or until the sauce has thickened and the tofu is cooked this sis your sesame Korean style tofu
Serve the spicy rice noodle soup in the bowl and top with the sesame Korean style tofu
Garnish with the sliced spring onion
Enjoy
